creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: short; print lined; black satin brocade with PR front side opening; two closures of loops and bell buttons; scattered large eight-pointed star cross stitch embroidery--red and white dominate; applique on front and lower edge, cuffs and around upper sleeve in multicolor; chenille pompoms above cuff
dimension:
12 x 20 1/4 in. (30.48 x 51.44 cm)
50 in. (127 cm) (object part, cuff to cuff)
medium: Silk, cotton, metal bells, chenille buttons; needlework
title: Boy's Jacket
